course_description: This course examines Brazilian literature and film. Students formulate responses in Portuguese to the various themes addressed in the different texts and films, both orally and in writing.
prerequisites: PORT 201 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 235 (36 Eagle Ro
